name: Tola Capital
overview: Tola Capital is a private-equity firm dedicated exclusively to pursuing the acquisition of Enterprise Information Technology-focused software companies. They look for software companies with products focused on solving the IT needs of Enterprise customers that have a solid customer base and a strong competitive position. Their primary acquisition targets are companies with strong business fundamentals and deep customer relationships, and they make investments with companies across a wide spectrum of current profitability - from strong current cash flows, to companies that need additional growth capital, to companies that are losing money today but have strong underlying business fundamentals and potential. They pursue software companies with revenues between $15 million and $90 million. Tola Capital is focused on companies in the US, Canada, and Europe.
